title: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Analyst / Investor Meet - Intimation 1d - The Company will participate in investor conference(s) as per enclosed schedule.

title: Disclosure Under Regulation 30 Of SEBI (LODR), Regulations, 2015 1d - Bharti Airtel fined Rs.1,04,000 by DoT for subscriber verification violation; company to pay penalty.

title: Disclosure Under Regulation 30 Of SEBI (LODR), Regulations, 2015 30 May - Rs.110,000 penalty imposed for subscriber verification violation; company to pay without contesting.

title: Compliances-Reg.24(A)-Annual Secretarial Compliance 28 May - Bharti Airtel's FY 2024-25 Annual Secretarial Compliance Report shows regulatory adherence, minor promoter fine.
date: 28 May - Bharti Airtel's FY 2024-25 Annual Secretarial Compliance Report shows regulatory adherence, minor promoter fine.

title: Disclosure Under Regulation 30 Of SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015 27 May - Bharti Airtel fined Rs. 6.48 lakh for subscriber verification violation; company to pay penalty without contest.
